title: The Warlord's Challenge
description: The Vanguard is broken. Their leader, a massive Scourge Warlord named 'Gore-Maw', steps into the courtyard, slamming his axe into the cobblestone. He demands single combat.

turns.narrative: Gore-Maw is ten feet tall, wearing pre-Scourge tank armor as plating. He charges with terrifying speed for his size.
turns.consequence_a: You miraculously stop his momentum, putting him off balance for a massive counter-attack.
turns.choice_b: Evade and strike his exposed back
turns.consequence_b: You slip past his swing and gouge a deep wound in his unarmored spine.

turns.narrative: Enraged, Gore-Maw begins violently spinning his massive axe, creating a localized tornado of death.
turns.choice_a: Throw a spear into the hurricane directly at his chest
turns.consequence_a: The spear hits a gap in his armor, stunning him and stopping the spin instantly.
turns.choice_b: Back away and focus on defensive magic
turns.consequence_b: You survive the onslaught, but the sheer force of the wind drains your stamina significantly.

turns.narrative: Gore-Maw drops to one knee, coughing black blood. The surviving horde watches in dead silence.
turns.consequence_a: His head rolls. The horde breaks and flees entirely. The vanguard is defeated.
turns.choice_b: Show him honor and walk away
turns.consequence_b: You leave him to bleed out. The horde is demoralized and scatters. You gain legendary status among the Wardens.

warlord_executed.description: You executed Gore-Maw in front of his horde.

warlord_shamed.description: You defeated Gore-Maw and let him die slowly, building your legend.

conclusion: You executed Gore-Maw in front of his horde.

risk_matrix.critical_failure: The attempt failed with minor lasting consequences. The thread remains open.
